alert.note: Alert for Huntingdon; Mifflin (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 1:18PM EDT until August 04 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Huntingdon County in central Pennsylvania... Southwestern Mifflin County in central Pennsylvania... * Until 200 PM EDT. * At 118 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Trough Creek State Park, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mount Union, Rockhill Furnace, Dudley, Raystown Dam, Shy Beaver, Trough Creek State Park, Entriken, Broad Top City, Mapleton, Orbisonia, Saltillo and Mill Creek. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
